720200.name: Vinewing
720200.description:
Vinewing is a story driven adventure game with RPG elements taking place in a fantasy world called Arrowtide.

Key Features

  • Cinematic cutscenes featuring characters with cool voices.
  • Explore the Arrowtide village, dungeons, and landscapes.
  • Boss fights with demons, dragons and more.
  • Level your character - acquire powerful weapons, shields and potions.
  • Retro game feeling.

Character Voices

We would like to give credits to the following wonderful youtubers/voice actors who gave our characters their voices:
  • Gibi ASMR – the voice of Vinewing
  • JackSucksAtLife – the voice of Gariax and Spirit of Aurin
  • Balenaproductions – the voice of Amergin (druid in the temple)
  • Jordan Antle (theFearRaiser) - the voice of the man at the Tavern and Arrowtide villager
  • TRYHARDNINJA – the voice of Captain of the guards
  • AviatorGaming - the voice of Brodgroth Taciturnus (family dad)
  • RealRosesAreRed - the voice of Bagheataine Taciturnus (family mom)
  • DARKK MANE – the voice of the Bookseller
  • Xycron – the voice of Dordeg
  • MandJTV Pokevids – the voice of the gold miner
  • lucahjin – the voice of Galexia (potion lady)
  • Pixelated Apollo – the voice of the Blacksmith
  • TEJBZ – the voice of the Barkeeper
  • Xisuma – the voice of Chax (the farmer)
  • DANZ NEWZ – the voice of Tumulir
  • ONE_shot_GURL – the voice of Ynisiana
  • Ms 5ooo Watts - the voice of the Baker
  • MeganPlays - the voice of the Baker's assistant
  • SomeThingElseYT - the voice of Bironan
  • AdventureGamingHQ – the voice of the ghost Alguir
  • rabbidluigi - the voice of the Jail Guard
  • figgehn – the voice of the Innkeeper
  • ChimneySwift11 - the voice of Hubard (person in old cabin)
  • The Anime Man - the voice of Edugus
  • Poke - the voice of druid in Arbolia ceremony
  • Ryan Laughton – the voice of Tabus
  • CypherDen - the voice of Arrowtide villager
  • Hatsy - the voice of Arrowtide villager
  • Indieun - the voice of Arrowtide villager
  • CherryRsR - the voice of Rebecca (waitress at the tavern)
  • Aimee Smith – the voice of Julia (waitress at the tavern)
